content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Policy Status The Policy Status tab displays all the products installed on the target endpoint, any Trend Micro Apex Central policies assigned, and the current policy status for each installed product. Click the Assigned Policy name to view or edit a policy. Â© 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
